page.title: Hurricane Damage to Hit Allstate Profits
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Allstate Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=ALL.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">ALL.N</A>, the No. 2 U.S. home and auto insurer, warned on Wednesday its third-quarter profits would fall well short of expectations due to more than \$1 billion in hurricane-related payouts.
